data.prayer: Spirit, make the church in Covasna, Romania humble and willing to hear the sometimes hard voices of prophets bringing the light of truth on them.
data.verse: So have I become your enemy by telling you the truth?

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Covasna, Romania
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, guide the 12,754 believers in the state of Covasna into all truth as they interpret Scriptures.
data.verse: For the word of God is alive and active. Sharper than any double-edged sword, it penetrates even to dividing soul and spirit, joints and marrow;

data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the state of Covasna, Romania.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Covasna, Romania.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Jew, Eastern Yiddish-speaking people. 0.0% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Lord, there are 175,962 people in the state of Covasna who claim Christianity, but may have never read the Bible. Please challenge them today to read the Bible for themselves.
data.verse: All Scripture is God-breathed and is useful for teaching, rebuking, correcting and training in righteousness

data.prayer: Father, we pray for every movement leader and disciple in the state of Covasna, Romania that they would have deepening intimacy with you.
data.verse: On that day you will realize that I am in my Father, and you are in me, and I am in you.

data.prayer: Father, please make every disciple be a disciple maker, every home a training center, and every church a church planting movement in the state of Covasna.
